emails.title: Asking for Information (Course Details)
emails.content:
Hi there,

Hope you’re doing well.

I’m writing because I’d like some info about your English course.

Can you tell me the start date, the schedule, and whether you give a certificate?

Also, could you let me know the price and how payment works?

Thanks a lot!

Best,
[Your Name]

styles.default:
Hi there,

Hope you’re doing well.

I’m writing because I’d like some info about your English course.

Can you tell me the start date, the schedule, and whether you give a certificate?

Also, could you let me know the price and how payment works?

Thanks a lot!

Best,
[Your Name]
styles.alternative1:
Hello!

Hope all’s good with you.

Quick question about your course — I’m thinking of signing up.

What are the dates and times, and do you offer any proof of completion?

Could you send me the total price too?

Thanks!

Cheers,
[Your Name]
styles.alternative2:
Hi,

Hope you’re having a good day.

I wanted to ask about the English course you’re offering.

Do you have the start date and weekly timetable?

And could you tell me the cost and how to pay?

Thanks so much.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Extension for an Assignment
emails.content:
Hi [Teacher Name],

Hope you’re doing well.

Could I get an extension on the assignment due on [Date]?

I’ve had [brief reason] and I’m a bit behind.

Would it be okay if I hand it in on [New Date]?

Thanks for understanding!

Best,
[Your Name]

Hi [Teacher Name],

Hope you’re doing well.

styles.alternative1:
Hello [Teacher Name],

Hope everything’s going well.

I wanted to ask for a bit more time for the assignment.

I’ve been dealing with [brief reason] and I’m not finished yet.

Could I submit on [New Date]?

Thanks!

[Your Name]
styles.alternative2:
Hi [Teacher Name],

Quick message.

Can I have an extension for the assignment due [Date]?

I’ve had [brief reason] and I’m behind schedule.

If it’s okay, I can hand it in by [New Date].

Thanks a lot.

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Problem With an Order
emails.content:
Hi Customer Service,

I hope you can help.

I’ve got an issue with my order [number].

The [product] arrived [issue], so I can’t really use it.

Can you let me know how to get a refund or replacement?

Thanks!

Best,
[Your Name]

styles.default:
Hi Customer Service,

I hope you can help.

I’ve got an issue with my order [number].

The [product] arrived [issue], so I can’t really use it.

Can you let me know how to get a refund or replacement?

Thanks!

Best,
[Your Name]
styles.alternative1:
Hello,

Hope you’re well.

I’m reaching out about order [number].

The item arrived [issue] and it’s not usable.

What’s the best way to return it and sort a replacement?

Thanks for your help.

[Your Name]
styles.alternative2:
Hi,

Quick question about my order.

Something went wrong with [product] (order [number]).

It arrived [issue].

Could you tell me how to fix this (refund or replacement)?

Thanks!

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Applying for a Job (Part-Time)
emails.content:
Hi [Name/Team],

Hope you’re doing well.

I’m applying for the part-time [position] role you posted.

I’ve got experience with [skill] and I can work [availability].

I attached my CV — happy to chat anytime.

Thanks!

Best,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Booking a Reservation
emails.content:
Hi,

Hope you’re well.

I’d like to book a reservation at [place].

It’s for [number] people on [date] at [time].

Can you confirm if that works?

Thanks!

Best,
[Your Name]
